p: We selected male-specific k-mers that had a count of minimum 50 in the male pool and 0 (represents ≤ 15 or ≥ 2000, due to previous filtering) in the female pool. For all 4 sequenced pools, we extracted full size reads containing the k-mer sequences and their respective read pair from the trimmed read data using a custom bash script ( https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.12326306).
